thread.section_title: RushMyPassport.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RushMyPassport.com | rushmypassport.com | 4 of 152
thread.title: John Ferguson

author: John Ferguson
title: John Ferguson
text:
I do a lot of business travel. I realized that my current passport was full. Though I didn't have an immediate travel planned, I was very worried about getting it taken care of quickly. I didn't want to take a risk of making some error that would result in a prolonged time period without a valid passport for travel.
I found rushmypassport.com online and gave it a shot. They did a great job of communicating the process and following up every step of the way. In particular, Francois "Topaz" Topasna, was very helpful in answering all my questions in a timely and accurate manner. I would definitely use them again.
